financial_entities: Merrill Lynch, Pierce, Fenner & Smith Incorporated (MLPF&S)

relationships.description: Research coverage and buy recommendations for Japanese stocks

transactions: sector rotation into cyclicals, banks, insurance
potential short yen / buy equities trade

analysis.purpose: Provide investment strategy recommendations for Japanese equities in 2017
analysis.significance: Detailed market analysis and stock recommendations from major financial institution during post-Trump election period

notable_quotes: We are bullish Japan equities for 2017 and we estimate the Nikkei 225 index will recover to 20,000 by end-2017
The biggest risk to our scenario is the implications for Japan's diplomatic and geopolitical environment of the Donald Trump presidency in the US
BofA Merrill Lynch does and seeks to do business with issuers covered in its research reports. As a result, investors should be aware that the firm may have a conflict of interest
red_flags: Potential conflicts of interest with covered companies

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found - document is standard investment research

illegal_activity.description: Standard financial research report with no illegal activity discussed

public_knowledge.context: Standard investment research report that would have been distributed to clients

analysis.summary: This is a Bank of America Merrill Lynch investment research report from November 2016 providing a bullish outlook on Japanese equities for 2017, predicting the Nikkei 225 would reach 20,000 by year-end and recommending rotation into cyclical stocks, banks, and insurance companies, while noting geopolitical risks from the newly elected Trump administration.
